speaker: Mt. Aegis
lines: Clouds part for a heartbeat. The world below gleams like a scale.
You do not know if the mountain is satisfiedâ€”only that it has finished weighing you.
Your footprints already blur; the path you took is becoming a rumor.
Somewhere a raven finishes its count and takes wing.
You begin the long descent, carrying one more story than you brought.
The wind decides not to take it from you.
